security: This document contains Richard A. Sprague's Social Security number, which has been redacted to prevent an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy. NW 88326 DocId:32244102 Page 3: Employee Social Security Number 402 30 6486.
summary: This document pertains to Richard A. Sprague's employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), detailing his payroll authorizations, salary adjustments, and a memorandum regarding payroll certifications.
summary_one_paragraph: This document contains payroll records and related forms for Richard A. Sprague, who served as Acting Counsel and Director for the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). It includes payroll authorization forms detailing his effective dates of employment, salary information, and title changes within the HSCA, as well as a memorandum regarding payroll certification requirements related to familial relationships with Members of Congress. The document also notes the partial postponement of information, specifically Social Security numbers, to protect personal privacy.
title: HSCA Staff Payroll Records
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives, All Staff Employees
